title: Fernando Verdasco progresses in Stockholm
text:
Fernando Verdasco progresses in Stockholm 19 Oct 2015 21:17:01 
comments 
Fernando Verdasco booked his place in the second round of the Stockholm Open on Monday with a straight-sets win over American Denis Kudla. 
The 31-year-old Spaniard, now ranked 44 in the world, broke his opponent once in the first set and twice in the second to secure a solid 6-4 6-4 victory. 
Also in first round action, Australia's John Millman advanced with a 7-6 (2) 6-3 win over German veteran Benjamin Becker. 
And another German, Alexander Zverev, saw off the determined challenge of local wild card Mikael ymer to win 7-6 (9) 6-7 (5) 6-4 in just over two and a half hours. Related Sport News
